attributes.action: Compel  Rafa Benitez stay on as Liverpool Manager
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since arriving from Spain Rafa has brought joy and pleasure to the people of Merseyside and beyond with his pioneering use of the two man team, flamboyant use of transfer funds to support ailing European sportsmen and his dispersal of local talent elsewhere. 

His continued presence in the post of manager at Liverpool is a healthy and positive state of affairs for the region and throughout Europe.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
